heading: Data Collection
list: Match At First Swipe collects user data, including personal information, to provide and improve our services.
Information collected may include profile data, location, and usage patterns.

heading: Data Use
list: We use data to facilitate matching, communication and personalize of the app.
Your data may be shared with third-party service providers for app functionality

heading: Data Protection
paragraph: Match At First Swipe employs security measures to protect user data. However, no system is entirely foolproof, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

heading: Cookies and Analytics
paragraph: We use cookies and analytics tools to gather information about app usage, improve our services, and deliver targeted content.

heading: Third-Party Links
paragraph: Match At First Swipe may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for their privacy practices.
